tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE meetup_events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  event_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  event_date DATE,
  event_location VARCHAR(100),
  event_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE digital_nomad_events (
    event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    event_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    date_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE digital_nomad_workshops (
    workshop_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    workshop_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    workshop_topic VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    presenter VARCHAR(100),
    workshop_date DATE,
    duration INTERVAL
);

CREATE TABLE meetup_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255),
    event_date DATE,
    event_location VARCHAR(255),
    event_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE workshops (
    workshop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    workshop_name VARCHAR(255),
    workshop_date DATE,
    workshop_location VARCHAR(255),
    workshop_topic VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE conferences (
    conference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    conference_name VARCHAR(255),
    conference_date DATE,
    conference_location VARCHAR(255),
    conference_theme VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE networking_opportunities (
    opportunity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    opportunity_name VARCHAR(255),
    opportunity_date DATE,
    opportunity_location VARCHAR(255),
    opportunity_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE meetup_events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  event_date DATE NOT NULL,
  event_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  event_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE workshops (
  workshop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  workshop_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  workshop_date DATE NOT NULL,
  workshop_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  workshop_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE conferences (
  conference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  conference_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  conference_date DATE NOT NULL,
  conference_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  conference_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE attendees (
  attendee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  attendee_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  attendee_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  attendee_event_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (attendee_event_id) REFERENCES meetup_events(event_id)
);
